messages.title: Vote to End This Mess
messages.content: "Boris Johnson transforms Tories into the party of Leave." - The Times, November 2019

messages.title: Vote Dem to Stop Brexit
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will stop Brexit on day one. We are the biggest strongest party of remain. We’ve been fighting Brexit since the day after the referendum and we will keep fighting.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will stop Brexit on day one and focus on tackling the big issues facing the UK.

issues.brexitEurope: The Liberal Democrats will stop Brexit on day one and fight against Brexit since the day after the referendum.
issues.economy: Stopping Brexit will help the UK to grow our economy.
issues.environment: We can tackle the climate emergency.
issues.health: Stopping Brexit will address the crises in our NHS.

community.content: The Liberal Democrats will help build a brighter future.

contactInformation.address: Lib Dems, 8-10 Great George Street, London, SW1P 3AE

quotes.text: "Boris is a compulsive liar who has betrayed every single person he has ever had any dealings with."
NIGEL FARAGE claimed the Tories offered Brexit Party candidates peerages to step aside in key target seats.

images.caption: Lib Dems lead the fight to stop Brexit
